feed.title: Track Awesome Clojure Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome Clojure libraries and resources. Inspired by awesome-... stuff

entry.title: Awesome Clojure Updates on Oct 31, 2021
entry.content:
Awesome macros usage

  • core.async (⭐2k) - transforms AST into CSP programs
  • cloroutine (⭐236) - suspends and continuations (coroutines)
  • missionary (⭐740) - a reactive dataflow programming toolkit
  • photon (⭐7) - realtime web, like Meteor, but for Clojure(Script)
  • metaclj (⭐81) - staged compilation
  • proteus (⭐113) - introduce mutable variables (don't use, just learn how to map your mind into immutable world)

entry.title: Awesome Clojure Updates on Jan 07, 2021
entry.content:
HTTP

  • clj-http (⭐1.8k) : Apache HttpComponents client wrapper
  • http-kit (⭐2.5k) : Simple, high-performance event-driven HTTP client and server
  • ring (⭐3.8k) : HTTP server abstraction
  • kvlt (⭐69) : Uniform, asychronous client interface for HTTP across JVM / Node / browsers
  • aleph (⭐2.6k) : Async client/server based on Netty, with defaults for HTTP, TCP and UDP

entry.title: Awesome Clojure Updates on Nov 05, 2018
entry.content:
Advanced datastructures

  • Persistent AVL trees (⭐133): persistent sorted maps and sets with log-time rank queries
  • Finger Tree (⭐216): double-list, counted-double-list, counted-sorted-set
  • Hitchhiker Tree (⭐1.2k): create fast, snapshottable, massively scalable databases
  • Hierarchical set (⭐8)
  • Ordered (⭐263): ordered sets and maps
  • Lazy Map (⭐49): whose values are only calculated when accessed
  • Durable Queue (⭐389): queue persisted on disk
  • bifurcan (⭐999): linear map/set/list (stores entries contiguously in memory), ;writtern in java, but test suite (read: usage examples) in clojure (⭐999)

entry.title: Awesome Clojure Updates on Aug 27, 2018
entry.content:
Machine Learning

  • clojure-tensorflow (⭐113)
  • dl4clj (deeplearning4j to clojure) (⭐99)

Video tutorials / YouTube

  • Misophistful's channel: Understand concepts such as list comprehension, threading macros, generative testing, destructuring, core.match and introductions to Light Table, Datomic and Game development with Clojure
  • Fred Overflow's channel: Introductions to Functional programming and TDD with Clojure
  • Clojure Pills screencast: Introduction to Clojure one function at a time
  • Data persistance with Postgres, Clojure and JDBC
